type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.GenerateEclipseProject
type.description:
Generates an Eclipse .project file. If you want to fine tune the eclipse configuration

At this moment nearly all configuration is done via EclipseProject.

method.name: getProjectModel
method.description: The Eclipse project model that contains the details required to generate the project file.

property.name: projectModel
property.description: The Eclipse project model that contains the details required to generate the project file.
